greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array T(n,k) = A153277(n-1,k) = A144150(n,k) read downwards antidiagonals.
comment: Column k is obtained by taking the k-th matrix power of the triangle A008277 and multiplying from the right with the column vector [1,0,0,0,....].
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 14 2005
